claims.claim: Global agentic AI market valued at $7-8 billion in 2025
Agentic AI market projected to reach $93-107 billion by 2032
85% of enterprises expected to implement AI agents by end of 2025
93% of IT leaders have implemented or plan to implement AI agents within 2 years
Average projected ROI of 171% from agentic AI deployments
OpenAI launched AgentKit on October 6, 2025 at DevDay
Anthropic released Agent SDK on September 29, 2025
LangChain has 80K+ GitHub stars and 600+ integrations
Top 3 agentic AI security concerns: Memory Poisoning, Tool Misuse, Privilege Compromise
80% of organizations have encountered risky AI agent behaviors
ReAct framework introduced by Yao et al. in 2022
North America holds 39.63% of AI agents market revenue share in 2025
AI agent startups raised $3.8 billion in 2024
Gartner forecasts 33% of enterprise software will incorporate agentic AI by 2028
Microsoft released AutoGen in late 2023
Anthropic released MCP (Model Context Protocol) in November 2024
MCP has over 10,000 published servers as of December 2025
Agentic AI Foundation (AAIF) launched December 9, 2025 under Linux Foundation
OpenAI adopted MCP protocol in March 2025
Google confirmed MCP support for Gemini in April 2025
OpenAI AgentKit has 4 components: Agent Builder, ChatKit, Evals for Agents, Connector Registry
Amazon Bedrock multi-agent collaboration became GA on March 10, 2025
AGENTS.md adopted by over 60,000 open source projects
Klarna AI assistant handled 2.3 million conversations in first month, cutting resolution time from 11 min to under 2 min
79% of organizations say they have adopted AI agents to some extent (PwC 2025 survey)
LangGraph excels in managing complex iterative workflows with graph-based approach
AutoGen from Microsoft distinguishes itself as enterprise-focused with actor model architecture
CrewAI prioritizes rapid prototyping and developer experience with role-based agents
MCP uses JSON-RPC 2.0 transport with stdio and HTTP/SSE mechanisms
MCP has three core primitives: tools (model-controlled), resources (app-controlled), prompts (user-controlled)
CrewAI architecture consists of Crews (autonomous collaboration) and Flows (deterministic orchestration)
AWS Bedrock Agents supports supervisor mode and supervisor-with-routing mode for multi-agent collaboration
Security researchers identified MCP vulnerabilities including prompt injection, tool permissions issues in April 2025
Global AI agents market projected to reach $216.8 billion by 2035 (CAGR 40.15%)
45% of enterprises run at least one production AI agent with access to critical business systems (Gartner), a 300% increase from 2023
